DOC.detailed_description: SUMMARY Sponsor : B. BRAUN Medical AG Trade name : Prontosan® Wound Irrigation Solution Prontosan® Wound Gel Active substance : Polihexanide ( 0.1 % ) Betaine ( 0.1 % ) Study Duration ( per patient ) : 13 week , include 1 week run period Primary Objective : To evaluate efficacy combination Prontosan® Wound Irrigation Solution Prontosan® Wound Gel reduction wind size hard-to-heal venous leg ulcer compare control saline irrigation solution inactive gel . Secondary Objectives : To assess change bio-burden ( assessment organism present ) determine local tolerance well reduction pain monitor exudate control . Methodology : A pilot randomise , double-blind , control clinical trial single centre Planned number patient : A sample size N= 15 evaluable patient estimate treatment group ( group `` A '' `` B '' ) . Adding dropout rate approx . 25 % result total number patient treatment group N=38 .
